name: The Printmaker's shirt
description:
My ode to my craft.  

Designed by a printmaker for other printmakers and print enthusiasts. 

Helvetica font and graphic in yellow on an asphalt coloured tee.  Handsome.  

This limited edition tee is designed to have a vintage look and feel.  How?  First, it's printed on a super soft 50/50 blend American Apparel shirt.   Extra comfy on your skin.  Second,  I use water-based ink which makes the graphic very touchable and less plastic feeling.   Very hyggelig indeed.

The shirts all feature the Be Hygge worker bee on the rear collar.  That way you look interesting from both the front and the back.

All Be Hygge shirts are hand silk-screened in Vancouver, BC.

name: The Wishbone shirt
description:
The furcula ("little fork" in Latin) is known to most as the wishbone.  Many a thanksgiving I've held one of these little fellas in my pinky and hoped for the best.   I put it on a shirt as a symbol of good luck.   

Silver ink on a navy tee.  Sleek.  

This one is also available in gold ink on a black shirt.  Rich.  

This limited edition tee is designed to have a vintage look and feel.  How?  First, it's printed on a super soft 50/50 blend American Apparel shirt.   Extra comfy on your skin.  Second,  I use water-based ink which makes the graphic very touchable and less plastic feeling.   Very hyggelig indeed.

The shirts all feature the Be Hygge worker bee on the rear collar.  That way you look interesting from both the front and the back.

All Be Hygge shirts are hand silk-screened in Vancouver, BC.

name: The Group of 7 shirt
description:
My tribute to their enduring legacy.  This logo appeared on the catalogue of the first Group of 7 exhibition held at the Art Gallery of Toronto in May 1920.  

Crisp white graphic on a black tee.  Classic.  

This limited edition tee is designed to have a vintage look and feel.  How?  First, it's printed on a super soft 50/50 blend American Apparel shirt.   Extra comfy on your skin.  Second,  I use water-based ink which makes the graphic very touchable and less plastic feeling.   Very hyggelig indeed.

The shirts all feature the Be Hygge worker bee on the rear collar.  That way you look interesting from both the front and the back.

All Be Hygge shirts are hand silk-screened in Vancouver, BC.

name: The Arches 88 shirt
description:
This is the watermark from a piece Arches 88 printmaking paper.  It's cleverly located down the side of the shirt, as it is on the paper.  

What explains my love affair of Arches 88?  The bright white, smooth and ink-receptive surface...100% cotton and mould made in France, lacking tooth...without sizing, it absorbs ink swiftly making it ideal for silkscreen printing.  

Grey ink on a white tee.  Dreamy.  

This limited edition tee is designed to have a vintage look and feel.  How?  First, it's printed on a super soft 50/50 blend American Apparel shirt.   Extra comfy on your skin.  Second,  I use water-based ink which makes the graphic very touchable and less plastic feeling.   Very hyggelig indeed.

The shirts all feature the Be Hygge worker bee on the rear collar.  That way you look interesting from both the front and the back.

All Be Hygge shirts are hand silk-screened in Vancouver, BC.
